id.description: Unique identifier for the actor. Required. This value should generally be the ID of the actor in the host system (e.g. user ID in a database).

admin.description: Whether the actor is an admin. Optional. Defaults to false.

super_admin.description: Whether the actor is a super admin. Optional. Defaults to false.

email.description: The email address of the actor. Optional.

permissions.description: A list of permissions that the actor has. Required.
